Title: Establishes the New York state meat processing expansion grant program and makes an appropriation therefor
Summary: Establishes the New York state meat processing expansion grant program to encourage the expansion of meat processing enterprises throughout the state; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง96-k, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the New York state meat processing grant expansion programs; and making an appropriation therefor
